component.name: query
component.description: Executes the specified SOQL query to retrieve

component.name: queryPerformanceFeedback
component.description: Retrieving query performance feedback without executing the query

component.name: listviewQueryPerformanceFeedback
component.description: Retrieving query performance feedback on a report or list view

component.name: queryMore
component.description: Retrieving additional query results if the initial results are too large

component.name: queryAll
component.description: Executes the specified SOQL query to retrieve details with deleted records

component.name: queryAllMore
component.description: For retrieving additional query results if the initial results are too large
